scripts.gitpush: lerna bootstrap && lerna link && git add . && git commit -m "prepublish" && git push
scripts.release:patch: lerna bootstrap && lerna link && git add . && git commit -m "prepublish" && git push && lerna version patch --yes --conventional-commits && lerna exec "yarn publish --access public --patch"

scripts.release:major: lerna bootstrap && lerna link && git add . && git commit -m "prepublish" && git push && lerna version major --yes --conventional-commits && lerna exec "yarn publish --access public --major"
